what: Interactive Graphic for Exploring Kidney Function Data in Clinical Trials
title: Interactive Graphic for Exploring Kidney Function Data in Clinical Trials
text: Interactive Graphic Exploring Kidney Function Data Clinical Trials

title: main chart (scatter plot)
text: one point per participant x-axis: max fold serum creatinine change baseline y-xais: – max eGFR change – max serum creatinine change baseline canvas color-coding: – level 1: — x-axis: 1.5-<2 x baseline — y-axis: 25-<50 0.3-<0.7 – level 2: — x-axis: 2.0-<3 x baseline — y-axis: 50-<75 0.7-<1.2 – level 3: — x-axis: 3.0-hi x baseline — y-axis: 75-hi 1.2-hi mark color-coding: delta serum creatinine change >= 0.3

title: main chart (scatter plot)
text: one point per participant per timepoint

title: main chart (scatter plot)
text: x-axis: time y-axis: result measures: – serum creatinine – serum cystatin C – difference

title: main chart (scatter plot)
text: x-axis: time y-axis: result measures: – eGFR serum creatinine – eGFR serum cystatin C – difference

title: main chart (scatter plot)
text: x-axis: time y-axis: result measures: – BUN – sodium – potassium – bicarbonate – chloride – phosphate – calcium

title: main chart (scatter plot)
text: x-axis: time y-axis: result measures: – systolic – diastolic

title: main chart (scatter plot)
text: x-axis: time y-axis: urine albumin / creatinine

text: click point main chart, view sub-charts specify length time measurements data filters

title: adbds — adbds
text: labs dataset tall format includes baseline   characteristics.

title: adbds — adbds
text: data frame 16,893 rows 25 columns. Retrieved   https://github.com/RhoInc/data-library/tree/master/data/clinical-trials/renderer-specific.

title: adlb — adlb
text: labs dataset tall format includes baseline   characteristics.

title: adlb — adlb
text: data frame 13708 rows 26 columns. Retrieved   https://github.com/RhoInc/data-library/tree/master/data/clinical-trials/renderer-specific   excluded VS tests keep lab tests. BLFL also derived.

title: adsl — adsl
text: subject-level dataset includes demographic information.

title: adsl — adsl
text: data frame 150 rows 14 columns. Retrieved   https://github.com/RhoInc/data-library/tree/master/data/clinical-trials/renderer-specific   selected adsl variables removed duplicates. BLFL also derived.

title: advs — advs
text: vital signs dataset tall format includes baseline   characteristics.

title: advs — advs
text: data frame 3170 rows 26 columns. Retrieved   https://github.com/RhoInc/data-library/tree/master/data/clinical-trials/renderer-specific   filtered VS tests. BLFL also derived.

text: Run core NepExplorer App

title: Run the core NepExplorer App — create_nepexplorer_app
code: create_nepexplorer_app(   data = list(dm = nepExplorer::adsl, labs = nepExplorer::adlb, vitals =     nepExplorer::advs),   mapping = NULL,   runNow = TRUE )

title: Run the core NepExplorer App — create_nepexplorer_app
text: data datasets loaded app. Sample nepExplorer data used default mapping list specifying initial mapping values data mapping domain (e.g. list(aes= list(id_col='USUBJID', seq_col='AESEQ')). runNow shiny app object created run directly? Helpful writing  functions dispatch shinyapps, rsconnect, shinyproxy.

Metadata data frame containing information about the data mapping used to configure safetyGraphics for the hepExplorer Chart. One record per unique data mapping — meta_nepExplorer
text: data frame X rows 10 columns domain Data domain text_key Text key indicating setting name. '--' delimiter indicates field level data mapping col_key Key column mapping field_key Key field mapping () type type mapping - "field" "column" label Label description Description multiple Mapping supports multiple columns/fields standard_adam Default values ADaM data standard standard_sdtm Default values SDTM data standard
